entities.name: jupiter
entities.description: Jupiter is mentioned as the celestial body that Harry is learning about. ("He pulled a map of Jupiter towards him and started to learn the names of its moons.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who received a note for detention. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students who received a note for detention. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is one of the students who received a note for detention. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who said goodbye to Harry and his friends before they went for their detention. ("At eleven o’clock that night they said goodbye to Ron in the common room and went down to the entrance hall with Neville.")

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who also received a detention. ("Filch was already there – and so was Malfoy . Harry had also forgotten that Malfoy had got a detention, too.")

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the one who gave them their detention notes. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

entities.name: prof. m. mcgonagall
entities.description: Prof. McGonagall is mentioned as the one who wrote the detention notes. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

relationships.description: Harry is learning about Jupiter and its moons. ("He pulled a map of Jupiter towards him and started to learn the names of its moons.")
Harry and Hermione are friends who received detention notes together. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")
Harry and Neville are friends who received detention notes together. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")

Harry and Ron are friends who said goodbye to each other before going for their detention. ("At eleven o’clock that night they said goodbye to Ron in the common room and went down to the entrance hall with Neville.")
Harry and Malfoy both received detention notes. ("Filch was already there – and so was Malfoy . Harry had also forgotten that Malfoy had got a detention, too.")
Harry is under Filch's authority as he gives them their detention notes. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")
Harry is under Prof. McGonagall's authority as she wrote their detention notes. ("Your detention will take place at eleven o’clock tonight. Meet Mr Filch in the Entrance Hall. Prof. M. McGonagall")
